title: University Of Virginia Investigates Rape Allegations
teaser: The University of Virginia's governing board meets today to address charges that the school has allowed a culture of rape to survive in its fraternities. In a recent issue of "Rolling Stone" magazine, a female freshman claimed she was raped by seven men at the prestigious Phi Kappa Psi fraternity in 2012.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
